si.title: මාළු දෂ්ට කිරීම නිසා ධීවරයෙකුට අවදානම
body_lines: දකුණු මුහුදේ අෙචුරූ ධීවරයෙකු බදාදා (18) බේරාගෙන ඇති අතර ඔවුන් කොළඹ වරායට ගෙන ගොස් කොළඹ ජාතික රෝහලට ඇතුළත් කර තිබේ.
රෝහලට ගෙන ගිය පුද්ගලයා වෙනප්පුව දූපතේ වෙසෙන ධීවරයෙකි, නාවික හමුදාව පවසයි.
මසුන් ඇල්ලීම සඳහා වෙනප්පුව ධීවර වරායෙන් ධීවරයින් හත් දෙනෙකු පටවා අඟහරුවාදා (17) ගැඹුරු මුහුදට ගියහ.. මෙය එසේ ය.

en.title: Risk to fisherman because of biting fish
body_lines: A fisherman who was in a state of disrepair in the south sea was rescued on Wednesday (18) and was taken to the Colombo port and admitted to the Colombo National Hospital.
The man who was taken to the hospital was a fisherman who lives on the island of Wennappuwa, the navy said.
Seven fishermen were loaded from the Wennappuwa fishing port for fishing and went to the deep sea on Tuesday (17).. This is the case.

summary_lines: Fishermen face risks when bitten by fish. A fisherman was rescued off the coast and hospitalized after being attacked while fishing in the southern seas. The incident highlights the dangers faced by fishermen during their work.
